title: We manage your apartment so that you don't have to.

benefits.title: Higher Returns
benefits.copy: We maximize your rental income through targeted listings and market expertise.

benefits.title: Increase Guest Satisfaction
benefits.copy: We ensure guest satisfaction through prompt communication and professional services.

benefits.title: Save Yourself Time
benefits.copy: Most of all, we help you make a steady income without sacrificing your time.

services.title: We help you maximize your property's value
services.copy: We leverage short term rentals to increase the profitability of your property while giving you flexibility and security.

items.title: Targeted Listings
items.copy: We maintain your listing with up-to-date messaging, photos and prices to help boost the occupancy rates.

items.title: Immediate Responses
items.copy: We ensure requests and inquiries are responded promptly so thatyou don't miss any potential reservations.

items.title: Custom Guestbook
items.copy: We create a customized recommendation booklet per home, ensuring that your guests experience the city as a local.

keypoints.title: We hold ourselves to high standards
items: Guest instructions on arriving and house rules
Guestbook with food and entertainment recommendations
Professional cleaning of your home after each guest's stay
Bedding and bath linen sets, vanity kits and coffee
On-call staff ensures handling of unexpected situations

offering.title: What you get from choosing HomeBnb
items: Creation of your listing on AirBnb
Custom guestbook with food and entertainment recommendations
Quality bedding and bath linen sets
24/7 Assistance for you and your guests
